TopicTitle: Most messed up working space/air craft

Articles.Content: Greetings fellow kerbalnauts! Today i need you to post the coolest/most insane space or aircraft, for future inspiration of course!

Don't know if it flies in 1.x, but....

The "Razorback"

[![zEDot82.png](http://i.imgur.com/zEDot82.png)](http://imgur.com/zEDot82)

[![16JiOSe.png](http://i.imgur.com/16JiOSe.png)](http://imgur.com/16JiOSe)

[![enjtISg.png](http://i.imgur.com/enjtISg.png)](http://imgur.com/enjtISg)

[![C1c42UO.png](http://i.imgur.com/C1c42UO.png)](http://imgur.com/C1c42UO)

[![IHH3fPB.png](http://i.imgur.com/IHH3fPB.png)](http://imgur.com/IHH3fPB)

[![X9jmoYb.png](http://i.imgur.com/X9jmoYb.png)](http://imgur.com/X9jmoYb)

[![IGgk6WG.png](http://i.imgur.com/IGgk6WG.png)](http://imgur.com/IGgk6WG)

[![dNmYZZ6.png](http://i.imgur.com/dNmYZZ6.png)](http://imgur.com/dNmYZZ6)

![2015-03-11_00001_zpshgnpxb4y.jpg](http://i357.photobucket.com/albums/oo19/TimePeriod/Kerbal%20Space%20Program/2015-03-11_00001_zpshgnpxb4y.jpg)

Yes, that is a box.

Yes, it is a VTOL.

Yes, it can be steered.

Yes, it can land. 

And no, you can't have the craft file. Its MINE.
That is genius you are my master
Moved to Spacecraft Exchange; the place for showcase threads.

Sometimes you get an idea in your head and you just have to go with it...

[.craft"\].craft file for the bold](http://foxwoodstudios.co.uk/kerbal/craft/1.0.2%20FAR/Sparrowhawk%20C%20%5BFAR)

Spaaaaaaarooooow...Haaaawk? Copy right in fridge mint?

> 
> Spaaaaaaarooooow...Haaaawk? Copy right in fridge mint?

[http://www.rspb.org.uk/discoverandenjoynature/discoverandlearn/birdguide/name/s/sparrowhawk/](http://www.rspb.org.uk/discoverandenjoynature/discoverandlearn/birdguide/name/s/sparrowhawk/) can't copyright a species ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Unless its fictional ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Now this is podracing mk4 is fairly out there as far as plane design goes.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2Y3DjnsRUDI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I'd say that my Lassi, spiritual clone of the *Cowboy Bebop's* Swordfish, is pretty improbable. I remember being amazed that it could take off at all, let alone push mach 1.
